meanings.definition: A short period of intense activity or illness.
meanings.sent1: After a few bouts of coughing, she felt better.
meanings.sent2: He experienced bouts of dizziness during the day.
meanings.sent3: The sudden bout of hiccups made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room in bouts.
meanings.sent5: The bout of rain soaked everything in seconds.

meanings.definition: A short period of intense competition or fighting.
meanings.sent1: The two boxers engaged in a fierce bout in the ring.
meanings.sent2: The chess tournament had several exciting bouts.
meanings.sent3: The playful bout between the siblings ended in laughter.
meanings.sent4: The bout for the championship title was unforgettable.
meanings.sent5: The bout between the rival teams kept the crowd on edge.
